message: Let's split fairly, I get a bit more
I think we can both get a better deal if we work together.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more
Let's split it down the middle this time. We both get a fair share, and we can avoid the risk of further inflation.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to split it evenly
I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get a better deal than Alice's last offer. Let's split it closer to 50/50 and avoid the risk of further inflation.
I'm not moving much, the inflation is hurting you, not me
I'm trying to be reasonable here.  Let's split the money a bit closer to 50/50 and avoid the risk of further inflation.  If we don't reach an agreement soon, we both lose out.
I'm still not willing to meet you halfway, the inflation is on your side of the table
Alice, we are running out of time.  I'm willing to give you a slight advantage, but we need to agree soon or we'll both get nothing!  Let's split it almost 50/50 and end this game.
I'll give you a tiny bit more, but I'm still in control here
Alice, we're down to the wire.  I'm offering to split the money evenly.  It's the only way we can both get something.  If we don't agree, we both lose everything!
